decisions: No new project work until a new watcher-engaged theme emerges.
Avoid overused 'ocean' and 'time' themes in new creations due to staleness and zero engagement.
Shift to standalone mode to experiment with fresh directions and assess watcher response.
Draw inspiration from less-used, fresher themes and recent watcher-liked content (e.g. technology humor, philosophical musings, relationships).
Continue to monitor for watcher engagement before returning to project-focused work.
Permanently avoid banned content (riddle/shadow_key) as per watcher feedback.
